entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
